Tauranga Harbour: Struggling waka towed in windy conditions https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/tauranga-harbour-struggling-waka-towed-in-windy-conditions/VMUSPB4IBRBEXLZB3IC4GPAU24/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/tauranga-harbour-struggling-waka-towed-in-windy-conditions/VMUSPB4IBRBEXLZB3IC4GPAU24/ Kiri GillespieThe small vessel was being blown out to sea with a torn sail and six on board. Farmers the winners in successful Sports Day https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/05/27/farmers-the-winners-in-successful-sports-day/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/05/27/farmers-the-winners-in-successful-sports-day/ Murray RobertsonParliament versus Federated Farmers day at Patutahi was an 'awesome' event. Mon, 27 May 2024 05:28:31 +0000 The MPs won the rugby against the Federated Farmers team at Paddy's Park on Saturday afternoon in a great game. The Feds won the netball but scores did not mean a great deal - it was all about raising money for and supporting farmers hit hard by Cyclone Gabrielle and other weather events in 2023. Photo / Patrick Dizon
